Description:
Detects usage of the powerShell New-MailboxExportRequest Cmdlet to exports a mailbox to a remote or local share, as used in ProxyShell exploitations

Author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Suspicious PowerShell Mailbox Export to Share
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where (command like '%new-mailboxexportrequest%' and command like '% -mailbox %' and command like '% -filepath \\\\%')
